languages.text: {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} Паскаля тревожно вибрирует.{/n} "Возможно, он гневается или скорбит из-за полученных ран. Я немедленно начну приготовления к молебну. Если {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} дарует мне понимание, я смогу умилостивить гордого {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа машины{/g} сего корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} Паскаля тревожно вибрирует.{/n} "Возможно, он гневается или скорбит из-за полученных ран. Я немедленно начну приготовления к молебну. Если {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} дарует мне понимание, я смогу умилостивить гордого {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}духа машины{/g} сего корабля".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} Паскаля тревожно вибрирует.{/n} "Возможно, он гневается или скорбит из-за полученных ран. languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中传来了帕斯卡焦急的声音，嗡嗡作响。{/n}“它可能是在生气，也可能是在哀叹遭受的伤害。我准备立刻进行祈祷仪式的准备工作。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}赋予我足够的理解能力，让我得以安抚这艘船的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中传来了帕斯卡焦急的声音，嗡嗡作响。{/n}“它可能是在生气，也可能是在哀叹遭受的伤害。我准备立刻进行祈祷仪式的准备工作。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}赋予我足够的理解能力，让我得以安抚这艘船的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声が不安げに{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}より響く。{/n}「怒っているのか、それとも己の受けた傷を嘆いているのかは定かではありません。自分はただちに、祈りの儀式の準備を開始します。もし{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が理解を示してくださるならば、この船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を鎮めることもできるはずです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声が不安げに{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}より響く。{/n}「怒っているのか、それとも己の受けた傷を嘆いているのかは定かではありません。私はただちに、祈りの儀式の準備を開始いたします。もし{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が私に理解を示してくださるならば、この船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を鎮めることもできるでしょう」

{n}パスカルの声が不安げに{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}より響く。{/n}「怒っているのか、それとも己の受けた傷を嘆いているのかは定かではありません。自分はただちに、祈りの儀式の準備を開始します。もし{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が理解を示してくださるならば、この船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を鎮めることもできるはずです」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme summt besorgt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Es ist vielleicht verärgert oder beklagt seine erlittenen Verletzungen. Ich werde umgehend einen Gebetsgottesdienst in die Wege leiten. Sollte der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} mir Einsicht gewähren, kann ich den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} dieses Schiffs besänftigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme summt besorgt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Es ist vielleicht verärgert oder beklagt seine erlittenen Verletzungen. Ich werde umgehend einen Gebetsgottesdienst in die Wege leiten. Sollte der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} mir Einsicht gewähren, kann ich den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} dieses Schiffs besänftigen."

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal grésille nerveusement depuis son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Peut-être est-il en colère, ou se lamente-t-il sur les tourments qu'il a subis. Je vais de ce pas préparer un service de prière. Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} m'en accorde la faculté, j'apaiserai l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Pasqal grésille nerveusement depuis son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Peut-être est-il en colère, ou se lamente-t-il sur les tourments qu'il a subis. Je vais de ce pas préparer un service de prière. Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} m'en accorde la faculté, j'apaiserai l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal emite un zumbido nervioso desde su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}.{/n} «Puede que esté enfadado, o tal vez lamente las heridas que ha sufrido. Procederé de inmediato con los preparativos de un servicio de oración. Si el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} me permite comprenderlo, aplacaré al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} de esta nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal emite un zumbido nervioso desde su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}.{/n} «Puede que esté enfadado, o tal vez lamente las heridas que ha sufrido. Procederé de inmediato con los preparativos de un servicio de oración. Si el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} me permite comprenderlo, aplacaré al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} de esta nave».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} endişeyle uğulduyor.{/n} "Kızgın olabilir ya da belki maruz kaldığı yaralara ağıt yakıyordur. Derhâl dua hazırlıklarına başlayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} bana idrak bağışlaması hâlinde bu geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhunu{/g} yatıştırabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice buzzes anxiously from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "It may be angry, or perhaps it is lamenting the injuries it has suffered. I will immediately initiate preparations for a prayer service. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants me comprehension, I will appease the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan endişeyle çıkıyor.{/n} "Kızgın olabilir, belki de aldığı yaralara ağıt yakıyordur. Derhâl bir dua hazırlığına başlayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in bana idrak bağışlaması hâlinde bu geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhunu{/g} yatıştırabilirim."
